## IAnnotation interface

An annotation applied to the series.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAnnotation 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [style?](./serialization.iannotation.style.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the style of the annotation. This allows style to be set for a chart as part of the "plot config" ([IPlotConfig](./plot.iplotconfig.md)<!-- -->). |
|  [text?](./serialization.iannotation.text.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Text for the annotation, this can also be set through the style. |
|  [value](./serialization.iannotation.value.md) | any | The value where the annotation is to be applied. |
|  [value2?](./serialization.iannotation.value2.md) | any | <i>(Optional)</i> Specifies a second value to create an annotation or a range of values. |
